home.welcomeMessage: Improve your communication skills with AI-powered roleplay training

difficulty.desc1: Very Easy - Warm and accepting conversation, almost no criticism
difficulty.desc2: Basic - Warm and encouraging but requires clear direction
difficulty.desc3: Challenging - Requires logic and evidence, critical questions and negotiation needed
difficulty.desc4: Advanced - Direct and pressuring conversation, quick decisions required

home.strategyCompleteDesc: The strategic conversation order for the scenario has been evaluated.
home.aiEvalErrorDesc: Strategy reflection was saved, but there was an issue generating the AI evaluation. Please check again on My Page.
home.analyzingFeedbackDesc: AI is deeply analyzing the conversation to create a personalized development plan.
home.exitConversationDesc: The current conversation will be stopped. You can continue the stopped conversation from history.

feedback.title: Personal Report
feedback.notGenerated: Feedback has not been generated yet

settings.languageUpdateFailed: Failed to update language settings. Please try again.

landing.title: AI Roleplay Communication Training
landing.description: Develop your communication skills by conversing with AI in realistic workplace scenarios. Improve with real-time feedback and strategic analysis.
landing.feature1Desc: Practice conversations with AI personas playing various roles like managers, colleagues, customers, and executives in realistic situations.
landing.feature2Desc: Plan your conversation order in advance and develop optimal communication strategies for each counterpart.
landing.feature3Desc: Get real-time emotion analysis and scores during conversations, and receive comprehensive feedback reports upon completion.
landing.loginHint: Sign in easily with Google, GitHub, Apple, or email
landing.demoTitle: ðŸ’¡ Practice in situations like these
landing.demoItem3: Mediating opinion differences with team members

intro.title: AI Roleplay Training
intro.subtitle: An innovative communication skills training system with AI
intro.step1Desc: Practice various real-world situations including negotiation, presentation, and conflict resolution.
intro.step2Desc: Simulate real work situations with AI characters of various personalities and roles.
intro.step3Desc: Monitor AI's emotional changes in real-time during conversations to improve communication skills.
intro.step4Desc: Receive detailed AI analysis and improvement suggestions after completing conversations.
intro.bubble1: I want to learn negotiation skills!

voice.sendError: Unable to send message. Please try again.
voice.resetDescription: Click 'Start Conversation' to begin a new conversation.
voice.notSupported: Voice recognition is not supported in this browser.
voice.inputCompleteDesc: Voice has been converted to text.
voice.inputStartDesc: Please speak. Click again to add more.
voice.inputErrorDesc: Unable to start voice recognition. Please try again.
voice.notAvailableDesc: Browser does not support speech synthesis.
voice.recognitionFailed: Could not recognize speech. Please try again.
voice.noSpeech: No speech detected. Please check your microphone and try again.
voice.notAllowed: Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access in browser settings.
voice.networkError: Voice recognition failed due to network error.
